bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions developing at the margins of one’s fingernails with the edges being inflamed, swollen and painful. This will eventually result in festering and the formation of scabs, and finally the loss of the fingernail. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 30: 代指者，其指先腫，焮焮熱痛，其色不黯，然後方緣爪甲邊結 膿，極者爪甲脫也 , “In the case of finger replacement , the respective finger will swell at first. Then it becomes burning red with heat pain. The color is not bright. Next there develops bound pus at the edge of the nail. In extreme cases, the fingernail falls off”.
